hero.title: Papelería Abril –
hero.subtitle: Digital transformation for a local stationery store with modern vision.

about_client.title: About the client
about_client.description_1: Papelería Abril is a local business established in Tacuarembó, Uruguay, offering a wide range of school supplies, office items and personalized gifts.
about_client.description_2: With more than 10 years of experience in the market, they sought to modernize their digital presence to reach more customers in their region.

google_visibility.title: Google visibility
google_visibility.description: They needed to improve their presence in search engines to be found by potential customers in Tacuarembó and surrounding areas.

modernize_image.title: Modernize their online image
modernize_image.description: They wanted to project a professional and modern image that reflected the quality of their products and services.

show_catalog.title: Show their product catalog
show_catalog.description: They needed a simple way to display their extensive product catalog organized by categories.

responsive_design.title: Responsive web design and development
responsive_design.description: I created a modern and fully responsive website using React, ensuring a perfect experience on all devices.

catalog.title: Organized product catalog
catalog.description: I implemented a dynamic catalog system with category filtering, making it easy for customers to find exactly what they're looking for.

contact_integration.title: Contact and location integration
contact_integration.description: We integrated WhatsApp, contact form and Google Maps to facilitate communication and help customers find the physical store.

seo.title: Technical and local SEO
seo.description: We optimized the site with local keywords, meta tags, schema markup and relevant content to improve its positioning in local searches.

impact.title: Project impact
improvements: Active presence on Google Maps and local searches
First results in searches like "stationery Tacuarembó"
Organic growth from the first month of implementation
Greater visibility of products and special offers

testimonial.quote: We are delighted with the new site, now our customers find us easily on Google. The organization by categories has made it much easier to show our catalog and we have noticed an increase in queries and sales.
testimonial.author: Ana Martínez

cta.title: Ready to boost your local business?
cta.description: Contact me today and discover how my digital transformation strategy can boost your local business as I did with Papelería Abril.
